website_summaries.verdict: A quality system, but the LogicMark just edges it out in terms of its feature set and ease of use.
pros: Simple setup allows you to program four contact numbers
Water-resistant pendant is responsive and easy to use
cons: It's somewhat costly, but you get a reliable system for your money

customer_reviews.title: ... system worked out the box and the coverage is excellent for my use
customer_reviews.text: The system worked out the box and the coverage is excellent for my use. The instruction was well written I like the two way communication pendant. Using this on a 90 year old mother. . Question; after setting three numbers in how can I add another number or replace one. can this unit be used as a stand along unit, not having the phone plug into this unit but having the phone plug into another wall outlet. I would highly recommend it to any elder person.
customer_reviews.author: haw89

customer_reviews.title: Buzzing Noise Solved
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this device for a few weeks now and the device itself works however when we call the person with the device there is a horrible buzzing sound on the land line. This is frustrating and we have moved the attachment to another phone with the same results. May need to return this if it does not stop or if we can not find a way to solve the problem. I wanted to update this review to let people know the buzzing sound is now gone. We placed the device farther away from the unit being worn so there is no longer a buzzing sound. I can now speak to my loved one clearly.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: A BOAT ANCHOR AROUND THE NECK
customer_reviews.text: It worked as it should've until the time to return the unit expired. Now the unit isn't working as advertised and it may as well be a boat anchor wrapped around my mother's neck for all the calling out it supposed do do when the button is pushed. I think I've had it all of 2 months and it's kaput.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: We have had the system a few days for my ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had the system a few days for my elderly mother. We live in an apartment next door and it didn't make sense to us to have her calls go to a call center. Instead they go to us or our building staff. System set up was simple and quick. While we have not had any emergencies yes Mom accidentally hit the button a couple of times and calls worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Took me a while to set it up and then ...
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to set it up and then learn how to use it. I consider it an excellant product meeting safety need ,and Andy was kind, helpful in setting up the lifeline .
customer_reviews.author: joe carman

customer_reviews.title: Less worry for my mom and for us!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and simple. Just what I needed for my mom, and 4 phone numbers without paying for a service makes more sense for our situation.
customer_reviews.author: XMorth

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Programming begun - satisfied so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Programming begun - satisfied so far. This unit meets most of my mothers desires - especially no contract. I like being able to talk to her when help is needed. She dislikes the size of the personal device. It's a compromise that will meet most of both our needs at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L Colwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works great if I can get my Father to keep it on.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: SUPER!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Haven't had to use it, by HIS grace.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed.
customer_reviews.text: Device works as designed. Had to have tech support reset the default number as it was set to 9. I needed the call number to start with a 1. Otherwise it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Medical Atert - Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: It was purchased for my mother in law who still is able to live alone in her home but it gives us and her the peace of mind to know if she needs us she can reach us with just hitting a button. It allows her to choose what she needs without automatically calling 911 when she could just use some help getting up or moving something which is not an emergency but would be helpful if someone would come now instead of later in the day. Makes us all more comfortable with our choice to have her at her home that she loves and holds her memories.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Terry

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 83 yo mom who lives alone ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 83 yo mom who lives alone. She loves it and is wearing the device around the apartment.
customer_reviews.author: John O.

customer_reviews.title: Best option
customer_reviews.text: Was fairly easy to set up and seems to work. I like no monthly fee!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the price. My mother has already used this and 911 was sent right away. She feels confident wearing the device around her neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for this life-saving product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is an excellent product, easy to set up and very comforting to know my parents during an emergency have the capability this alert system allows in contacting their loved ones or 911 at the press of a button. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos V.

customer_reviews.title: Switched to the old school phone and got it done easily.
customer_reviews.text: Only issue was using my VOIP phone to program the unit. Switched to the old school phone and got it done easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McGeever

customer_reviews.title: Medical alert sytem works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This medical alert system works as advertised. Very happy with system for my parents.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. 10-15 minutes. Real peace of mind
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Gives peace of mind to me and my mother. Easy to follow directions. Recommend this to anyone who has a dependent that you cannot be with 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: Jere Gunderman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and simple system with easy to follow instructions for installation. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my 95 year old mother who's vision is impaired and memory is dimming. The only issue was to impress on her that she had to push and hold the one button for a couple of seconds and not keep pushing it rapidly and repeatedly. She finally got the hang of it. I programmed my phone number and not 911, not a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M. Lowen

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with easy setup procedure and the features
customer_reviews.text: We bought this system for our 80+ years old mom and just setup this device. Very impressed with easy setup procedure and the features. The best feature is that you can program this device to call only 911, only your contacts, or your contacts and 911. This device is designed for elder's use and setup directions are also elder friendly and easy. Pendant is very light and you can wear it on your wrist, neck or using the belt clip. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Neil T.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just set it up and hope my family doesnt need to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Joe W.

customer_reviews.title: Health Aid for folks: no more monthly costs! 2 thumbs UP!
customer_reviews.text: Good: complete package solution for older people - use it primarily as a health aid, but others may come to hand! Must improve: range; maximum number of devices (4 is not enough); foreign languages (yes, we do like english - but my folks prefer alert calls in portuguese!); 3G/4G compliant (in case landline is not available).
customer_reviews.author: .:aeronavilles:.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of false alerts
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's okay--I've never needed it. But it has gone off accidently when touching something, laying on opposite side of button when I took it off to change clothes, and another time that I'm unsure what set it off. The false alerts set off a chain of phone calls, people coming to check on me and ultimately the police.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: All arrived on time and easy set up just wish there was a volume control :)
customer_reviews.author: Mitch P.

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to program
customer_reviews.text: This product works as it is described. It was easy to program. The second/spare rechargeable battery is a plus. My only complaint is that you must speak close and directly into the pendant to be heard by the contacted person.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Return timeframe too short!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on December 28th and now on February 4th the device isn't working and even new batteries won't keep a charge for more than a day. When it runs out of batteries it forgets the numbers that were programmed. We would spend more on batteries to keep this thing going than we would on a monthly subscriptio with a Life Alert system. We exceeded the return window and now we are out $200 a month later. Not happy with this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Levesque

customer_reviews.title: System is easy enough to use but had problems with the battery ...
customer_reviews.text: System is easy enough to use but had problems with the battery for small piece. Manufacturer responded right away by sending new batteries, but I question that the batteries will last 4 months before charging them again as indicated in the manual. Recommend switching the two AAA batteries once a week as we had problems with a low battery (which had only been in the small piece for 6 days) and the unit started the call sequence when it wasn't activated by user.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT! Easy to install and set up with ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT! Easy to install and set up with nothing more than a phone line needed. Different settings allow you to choose whether just your programmed numbers are called, 911 directly, or both. Great range allows 600 ft of coverage from base. Easy to use with no extra costs. Rechargeable batteries make the whole unit very self contained...no extra charges anywhere. Wonderful for allowing an older person to stay in their own home with far less worries. HIGHLY RECCOMEND
customer_reviews.author: Mountainmommapa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 94 yo mom that lives with us, to give both her and us a little more peace of mind when we leave the house and she's alone. The product itself appears to be excellent quality, with the ideal features for keeping in contact. Simple to setup and maintain, great instructions, and simple for her to use. It's refreshing to see a product as well thought out and designed as this one appears to be - I'm impressed! Our family feels better already, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Coffee guy

customer_reviews.title: Best alert system out there!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit last year after much searching. The search was worth it. The unit works great and my family has some peace knowing if mom needs us - she can hit the alert button. She fell 2 different times & it worked great. She was not hurt either time & didnt need an ambulance - just assistance getting up. The best part is that it calls the numbers you program into it instead of a service. Me & my sisters are programmed into it & if need be, we can call 911. There are so many good features on this alert system - I recommend it to everyone I know!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My mom did but like her prior medical system because it called 911 and ...
customer_reviews.text: My mom did not like her prior medical system because it called 911 and she might only need help getting up. This calls 4 people of your choosing before calling 911. Hookup was easy, the battery changing is easy...you just unscrew a top. The sound was excellent when we tried a test call.
customer_reviews.author: Debra H. Kyser

customer_reviews.title: Worked great during the one year warranty period.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit in March of 2017. It just went out of the one year warranty and now the pendant doesn't work. It worked great for one year and two months. I would imagine the pendant has gone bad and I checked on Life Link's website and a new pendant would cost right at $75. Probably will not do this. Don't know if my problem is common, but I would say to purchase at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Gar Rac01

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to set up and everything tested ok the first ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 91 year old mother. She wants to live alone for as long as possible so this was the only option for us. It was very easy to set up and everything tested ok the first time! Very pleased with this alert system and it gives me peace of mind that I am there in a few minutes if she should fall.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Like simplicity, self test
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't saved my life yet, but I'm certain it might. Like simplicity, self test, and option to call 911 as primary (and only). Wish it had a setting to allow me to first call 911 and then call someone nearby.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to set-up - it literally talks you through each ...
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to set-up - it literally talks you through each step. The sound through the speaker is very clear, no crackling or distortation. I particularly like that the pendant battery lasts for up to 4 months on a single charge and a second/back-up battery comes with it that charges in the base unit so it is ready to go whenever you need it. Highly recommend the unit.
customer_reviews.author: jdjane

customer_reviews.title: Great product,  offers peace of mind for my 91-year-old mother
customer_reviews.text: I waited a couple days before I decided to set up the unit. The reason I waited was because I thought it would be difficult to set up. I wanted to make sure I had the time to do it. But I was wrong, very easy to set up and get working. I was done in 15 minutes or so. Great product, offers peace of mind for my 91-year-old mother.
customer_reviews.author: Jim T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for elderly parents and you can set it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for elderly parents and you can set it to only call your cell phones that you set up and if you want to add 911 you can but you don't have to include the 911 service when you set it up.
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Clichéd, but I weep...
customer_reviews.text: Tested, trusted.. how do you rate a product that gives an elderly, "mobility challenged" 86 year old, peace of mind as things continue to get tougher? Thank you Life Link Response for this product which helps us ALL get through each day knowing we have a little more control and a little more time for my mom to be able to stay in the comfort of the home she's loved for 50 years. Thank you for making it so easy, fast and straightforward to set up.. and thank you for the supportive emails you've sent offering any needed assistance (which HASN'T been needed because it's a rock solid product)!
customer_reviews.author: SLL

customer_reviews.title: Investment you hope you don't have to utilize!
customer_reviews.text: A necessary tool for aging parents who insist on living by themselves. Nice because there are no monthly fees. Wish they could make the pendant smaller. My 90 yr old mother refuses to wear it around her neck. Puts in pocket instead. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Bestestgramma

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy So Far!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Very easy to set up with voice activated directions. Mom now has it around her neck and thankfully she has not had to use it. Just knowing it is there is a relieve!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Simple Solution
customer_reviews.text: Arrived carefully packaged and in perfect condition. Simple solution to a seemingly complex problem. Battery lasts well over a week. Spare battery is always recharging in base. Super easy to setup and has been very reliable. Currently have it set to notify two "friends" but not 911. Is the perfect solution for us with no monthly fees. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TWL

customer_reviews.title: dad was able to easily follow the setup instructions
customer_reviews.text: arrived promptly, dad was able to easily follow the setup instructions, the pendant is a little large but works well if mom will wear it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Karen Disney

customer_reviews.title: Medic Alert System
customer_reviews.text: It took a little while to set up. We think it will work well for my husband. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: J. J.

customer_reviews.title: Setup was easy. Household members were easily trained and the operation ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not had to use this yet, thankfully. Setup was easy. Household members were easily trained and the operation was easy to teach.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: She also wanted an easy to use system without the monthly fees
customer_reviews.text: Mom did not want 911 called. She also wanted an easy to use system without the monthly fees. This is perfect. Just think of it as a tiny walkie-talkie that she wears. Push the button and it will dial up to 4 people (plus 911 if you select that feature). The setup was easy. We already used it for one fall. It called my cell phone and I knew right away she needed help. The spare rechargeable battery with the built in charger makes this even better. Very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and worked during testing. Haven't had to use it for an emergency, hopefully never will.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy in CV

customer_reviews.title: Seems To Be Good.
customer_reviews.text: As described, seems to work correctly. Haven't needed it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher K. Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Everything works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother in-law. Everything works great.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for! No monthly fee . So easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Debby L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to subscription based systems. Reasonably price but a little tedious to program. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: William Teel

customer_reviews.title: Real solution for Seniors
customer_reviews.text: This is my second system purchased. I bought one for my mom several years ago and it was even better than I hoped. I just bought another for my mother-in-law. Simple system that has everything you hoped for and more. I even get a call if the pendant's battery is low.
customer_reviews.author: Momma D

customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Don't pay over $30 a month.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Don't pay for a central station. The user can talk to who answere and get help immediately. Great product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
